--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron stood in the entrance way, and looked at Blind Chaos, and
> Dominjoe. "I will personally give you both a tour." he said. 
Megatron
> was now happy, and it showed.

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Domnijoe wheeled to look at her commander and gave a polite bow.
    "I would be honored, Milord." she said. She was glad she had 
caught the commander in his more...amused...momments.
    Blindchaos turned to face his new commander as well, but he 
looked worse for wear. He brightened at the tour invitation. 
    "Thank you Meg..I mean Lord Megatron!!" he chirrped. He gave  
Domnijoe an uncertain stare, then shrugged. "Where are we off to 
first..whenever yer not busy....??"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
